question: 6712 i.e. Is it necessary to read iqamat in the mosque for ada and qaza salats when I perform myself (not with jamath...
answer:
QUESTION
I am referring to Part 2 of question No. 6712 i.e. Is it necessary to read iqamat in the mosque for ada and qaza salats when I perform myself (not with jamath). And your fatwa is. It is Makrooh (disliked) to omit the Iqaamat when performing Salaat individually. (Ibid pg.394). I think you wanted to write ?to not omit? instead of ?to omit?. May be you wrote it by misunderstanding. Please clarify.
ANSWER


Share:
We have reviewed our answer.

It is Makrooh to omit (leave out) the Iqaamat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
